businesses.name: Callipso One
businesses.business_details:
After 20 years in the corporate world, I decided to follow my life-long dream and opened Callipso One in July 2016. Having lived in the area for many years, the opportunity to trade in Glenferrie Road was too good to refuse.

Located at 797 Glenferrie Rd, Hawthorn VIC, Callipso One offers a range of unique and contemporary designs from various local and international brands. 

Our aim is to match our clients with clothing that will make them look and feel fabulous and confident.

With this in mind we also offer professional styling sessions for existing and new clientele, call Tracy on 98185569 to book your appointment
businesses.product_details: Clothing brands imported & local Australian labels selected for sassy women 35-70 year olds, Offering one on one consultations instore for individual service.
businesses.new_products:
- Boutique open by appointment only – social distancing rules apply
- Changes products/ services – weekly email sent to all VIP’s. Not a VIP? Join free on the website to be included in the mailing list
- New online store – website updated with new season stock
- Now offering  free delivery Australia wide by express post

Follow us on Facebook @callipsoboutique | Insta @callipso.one
businesses.headline: Unique & Wearable clothing
